precomposition.title: Precomposition
precomposition.description: Asset containing a composition that can be referenced by layers.

p.title: File Name
p.description: Name of the asset file or a data url

image.title: Image
image.description: Asset containing an image that can be referenced by layers.

id.title: ID
id.description: Unique identifier used by layers when referencing this asset

data-source.title: Data source
data-source.description: External data source, usually a JSON file

composition.title: Composition
composition.description: An object that contains a list of layers

g.title: Generator
g.description: Software used to generate the file

animation.title: Animation
animation.description: Top level object, describing the animation

v.title: Bodymovin version, on very old versions some things might be slightly different from what is explained here

ver.title: Specification Version
ver.description: Specification version this Lottie is targeting. This is a 6 digit number with version components encoded as `MMmmpp`, with `MM` being major version, `mm` being minor and `pp` being patch.

op.title: Out Point
op.description: Frame the animation stops/loops at, which makes this the duration in frames when `ip` is 0

assets.title: Assets
assets.description: List of assets that can be referenced by layers

comps.title: Extra Compositions
comps.description: List of Extra compositions not referenced by anything

chars.title: Characters
chars.description: Data defining text characters as lottie shapes. If present a player might only render characters defined here and nothing else.

markers.title: Markers
markers.description: Markers defining named sections of the composition.

slots.title: Slots
slots.description: Dictionary of slot ids that will replace matching properties.

stroke-dash-type.title: Stroke Dash Type
stroke-dash-type.description: Type of a dash item in a stroked line

composite.title: Composite
composite.description: How to stack copies in a repeater

oneOf.title: Below
oneOf.description: Subsequent copies are added underneath the previous ones.

oneOf.title: Above
oneOf.description: Subsequent copies are added on top of the previous ones.

gradient-type.title: Gradient Type
gradient-type.description: Whether a Gradient is a linear or radial.

oneOf.title: Linear
oneOf.description: Colors transition in a single linear direction.

oneOf.title: Radial
oneOf.description: Colors transition outward from a center point.

trim-multiple-shapes.title: Trim Multiple Shapes
trim-multiple-shapes.description: How to handle multiple shapes in trim path

oneOf.title: Parallel
oneOf.description: All shapes apply the trim at the same time

oneOf.title: Sequential
oneOf.description: Shapes are considered as a continuous sequence

line-cap.title: Line Cap
line-cap.description: Style at the end of a stoked line

star-type.title: Star Type
star-type.description: Whether a PolyStar is a star or a polygon

matte-mode.title: Matte Mode
matte-mode.description: How a layer should mask another layer

oneOf.title: Normal
oneOf.description: The layer is not used as a track matte

oneOf.title: Alpha
oneOf.description: The masked layer opacity is modulated by the track matte layer opacity

oneOf.title: Inverted Alpha
oneOf.description: The masked layer opacity is modulated by the inverted track matte layer opacity

oneOf.title: Luma
oneOf.description: The masked layer opacity is modulated by the track matte layer luminance

oneOf.title: Inverted Luma
oneOf.description: The masked layer opacity is modulated by the inverted track matte layer luminance

shape-direction.title: Shape Direction
shape-direction.description: Drawing direction of the shape curve, useful for trim path

text-shape.title: Text Shape
text-shape.description: Defines the function used to determine the interpolating factor on a text range selector.

line-join.title: Line Join
line-join.description: Style at a sharp corner of a stoked line

mask-mode.title: Mask Mode
mask-mode.description: Describes how a mask interacts (blends) with the preceding masks in the stack.

text-range-units.title: Text Range Units
text-range-units.description: Unit type for a text selector

fill-rule.title: Fill Rule
fill-rule.description: Rule used to handle multiple shapes rendered with the same fill object

oneOf.title: Non Zero
oneOf.description: Everything is colored (You can think of this as an OR)

oneOf.title: Even Odd
oneOf.description: Colored based on intersections and path direction, can be used to create "holes"

fill-effect.title: Fill Effect
fill-effect.description: Replaces the whole layer with the given color

tritone-effect.title: Tritone Effect
tritone-effect.description: Maps layers colors based on bright/mid/dark colors

matte3-effect.title: Set Matte Effect
matte3-effect.description: Uses a layer as a mask

prefixItems.title: Layer
prefixItems.description: Use this layer as a mask

prefixItems.title: Channel
prefixItems.description:
Channel to use as a mask:
1 - Red
2 - Green
3 - Blue
4 - Alpha
5 - Luminance
6 - Hue
7 - Lightness
8 - Saturation
9 - Full
10 - Off

prefixItems.title: Invert
prefixItems.description: Use 0 as opaque value when true

prefixItems.title: Show Mask
prefixItems.description: If false, the mask layer won't be shown

custom-effect.title: Custom Effect
custom-effect.description: Some lottie files use `ty` = 5 for many different effects

prefixItems.title: Black Color
prefixItems.description: Tint of the darker parts of the layer

prefixItems.title: White Color
prefixItems.description: Tint of the lighter parts of the layer

prefixItems.title: Intensity
prefixItems.description: Intensity of the effect, 0 means the layer is unchanged. 100 means full effect

drop-shadow-effect.title: Drop Shadow Effect
drop-shadow-effect.description: Adds a shadow to the layer

slottable-object.title: Slottable Object
slottable-object.description: Object that may have its value replaced with a slot value

sid.title: Slot Id
sid.description: Identifier to look up the slot

a.title: Anchor Point
a.description: Anchor point: a position (relative to its parent) around which transformations are applied (ie: center for rotation / scale)

sk.title: Skew
sk.description: Skew amount as an angle in degrees

sa.title: Skew Axis
sa.description: Direction along which skew is applied, in degrees (`0` skews along the X axis, `90` along the Y axis)

rz.title: Z Rotation
rz.description: Split rotation component, equivalent to `r` when not split

nm.title: Name
nm.description: Human readable name, as seen from editors and the like

slot.title: Slot
slot.description: Defines a property value that will be set to all matched properties

marker.title: Marker
marker.description: Defines named portions of the composition.

slottable-property.title: Slottable Property
slottable-property.description: Property that may have its value replaced with a slot value

refId.title: Sound Id
refId.description: ID of the sound as specified in the assets

precomposition-layer.title: Precomposition Layer
precomposition-layer.description: Layer that renders a Precomposition asset

refId.title: Reference Id
refId.description: ID of the precomp as specified in the assets

tm.title: Time Remap
tm.description: Timeline remap function (frame index -> time in seconds)

visual-layer.title: Visual Layer
visual-layer.description: Layer used to affect visual elements

ao.title: Auto Orient
ao.description: If 1, the layer will rotate itself to match its animated position path

tt.title: Matte Mode
tt.description: Defines the track matte mode for the layer

tp.title: Matte Parent
tp.description: Index of the layer used as matte, if omitted assume the layer above the current one

td.title: Matte Target
td.description: If set to 1, it means a layer is using this layer as a track matte

hasMask.title: Has Masks
hasMask.description: Whether the layer has masks applied

masksProperties.title: Masks
masksProperties.description: Optional array of masks for the layer.

mb.title: Motion Blur
mb.description: Whether motion blur is enabled for the layer

cl.title: CSS Class
cl.description: CSS class used by the SVG renderer

ln.title: Layer XML ID
ln.description: `id` attribute used by the SVG renderer

tg.title: Layer XML tag name
tg.description: tag name used by the SVG renderer

cp.title: Collapse Transform
cp.description: This is deprecated in favour of `ct`

ct.title: Collapse Transform
ct.description: Marks that transforms should be applied before masks

null-layer.title: Null Layer
null-layer.description: Layer with no data, useful to group layers together

pe.title: Perspective
pe.description:
Distance from the Z=0 plane.
Small values yield a higher perspective effect.

refId.title: Reference Id
refId.description: ID of the image as specified in the assets

refId.title: Data source Id
refId.description: ID of the data source in assets

ind.title: Index
ind.description: Index that can be used for parenting and referenced in expressions

parent.title: Parent Index
parent.description: Must be the `ind` property of another layer

ip.title: In Point
ip.description: Frame when the layer becomes visible

op.title: Out Point
op.description: Frame when the layer becomes invisible

unknown-layer.title: Unknown layer types
unknown-layer.description: Unknown layer types. Types not defined by the specification are still allowed.

scalar-property.title: Scalar Property
scalar-property.description: An animatable property that holds a float

vector-property.title: Vector Property
vector-property.description: An animatable property that holds an array of numbers

l.title: Length
l.description:
Number of components in the value arrays.
If present values will be truncated or expanded to match this length when accessed from expressions.

base-keyframe.title: Base Keyframe
base-keyframe.description: A Keyframes specifies the value at a specific time and the interpolation function to reach the next keyframe.

i.title: In Tangent
i.description: Easing tangent going into the next keyframe

o.title: Out Tangent
o.description: Easing tangent leaving the current keyframe

split-position.title: Split Position
split-position.description: An animatable position where x and y are definied and animated separately.

s.title: Split
s.description: Whether the position has split values

gradient-property.title: Gradient Property
gradient-property.description: An animatable property that holds a Gradient

bezier-property.title: Bezier Property
bezier-property.description: An animatable property that holds a Bezier shape

position-property.title: Position Property
position-property.description: An animatable property to represent a position in space

e.title: End value
e.description: Value at the end of the keyframe, note that this is deprecated and you should use `s` from the next keyframe to get this value

gradient-stops.title: Gradient stops
gradient-stops.description: Animatable vector representing the gradient stops

x.title: X
x.description:
Time component:
0 means start time of the keyframe,
1 means time of the next keyframe.

y.title: Y
y.description:
Value interpolation component:
0 means start value of the keyframe,
1 means value at the next keyframe.

color-property.title: Color Property
color-property.description: An animatable property that holds a Color

e.title: End value
e.description: Value at the end of the keyframe, note that this is deprecated and you should use `s` from the next keyframe to get this value

ti.title: Value In Tangent
ti.description: Tangent for values (eg: moving position around a curved path)

to.title: Value Out Tangent
to.description: Tangent for values (eg: moving position around a curved path)

splittable-position-property.title: Splittable Position Property
splittable-position-property.description: An animatable position where position values may be defined and animated separately.

s.title: Split
s.description: Whether the position has split values

e.title: End value
e.description: Value at the end of the keyframe, note that this is deprecated and you should use `s` from the next keyframe to get this value

e.title: End value
e.description: Value at the end of the keyframe, note that this is deprecated and you should use `s` from the next keyframe to get this value

graphic-element.title: Graphic Element
graphic-element.description: Element used to display vector data in a shape layer

cl.title: CSS Class
cl.description: CSS class used by the SVG renderer

ln.title: Layer XML ID
ln.description: `id` attribute used by the SVG renderer

repeater.title: Repeater
repeater.description: Duplicates previous shapes in a group

pucker-bloat.title: Pucker Bloat
pucker-bloat.description: Interpolates the shape with its center point and bezier tangents with the opposite direction

stroke-dash.title: Stroke Dash
stroke-dash.description: An item used to described the dash pattern in a stroked path

h.title: Highlight Length
h.description: Highlight Length, as a percentage between `s` and `e`

a.title: Highlight Angle
a.description: Highlight Angle in clockwise degrees, relative to the direction from `s` to `e`

shape.title: Shape
shape.description: Drawable shape, defines the actual shape but not the style

d.title: Direction
d.description: Direction the shape is drawn as, mostly relevant when using trim path

group.title: Group
group.description: Shape Element that can contain other shapes

repeater-transform.title: Repeater Transform
repeater-transform.description: Transform used by a repeater, the transform is applied to each subsequent repeated object.

so.title: Start Opacity
so.description: Opacity of the first repeated object.

eo.title: End Opacity
eo.description: Opacity of the last repeated object.

modifier.title: Modifier
modifier.description: Modifiers change the bezier curves of neighbouring shapes

zig-zag.title: Zig Zag
zig-zag.description: Changes the edges of affected shapes into a series of peaks and valleys of uniform size

offset-path.title: Offset Path
offset-path.description: Interpolates the shape with its center point and bezier tangents with the opposite direction

unknown-shape.title: Unknown shape types
unknown-shape.description: Unknown shape types. Types not defined by the specification are still allowed.

shape-style.title: Shape Style
shape-style.description: Describes the visual appearance (like fill and stroke) of neighbouring shapes

no-style.title: No Style
no-style.description: Represents a style for shapes without fill or stroke

text-range.title: Text Range
text-range.description: Range of text with custom animations and style

animated-text-document.title: Animated Text Document
animated-text-document.description: Animated property representing the text contents

sid.title: Slot ID
sid.description: One of the ID in the file's slots

font.title: Font
font.description: Describes how a font with given settings should be loaded

ascent.title: Ascent
ascent.description: Text will be moved down based on this value

fName.title: Name
fName.description: Name used by text documents to reference this font, usually it's `fFamily` followed by `fStyle`

fClass.title: CSS Class
fClass.description: CSS Class applied to text objects using this font

character-precomp.title: Character Precomp
character-precomp.description: Defines a character as a precomp layer

refId.title: Reference Id
refId.description: ID of the precomp as specified in the assets

ip.title: In Point
ip.description: Frame when the layer becomes visible

op.title: Out Point
op.description: Frame when the layer becomes invisible

text-document-keyframe.title: Text Document Keyframe
text-document-keyframe.description: A keyframe containing a text document

lh.title: Line Height
lh.description: Distance between lines on multiline or wrapped text

sz.title: Wrap Size
sz.description: Size of the box containing the text

ps.title: Wrap Position
ps.description: Position of the box containing the text

t.title: Text
t.description: Text, note that newlines are encoded with \r

text-follow-path.title: Text Follow Path
text-follow-path.description: Uses the path described by a layer mask to put the text on said path.

m.title: Mask
m.description: Index of the mask to use

text-data.title: Text Data
text-data.description: Contains all the text data and animation

int-boolean.title: Integer Boolean
int-boolean.description: Represents boolean values as an integer. `0` is false, `1` is true.

color.title: Color
color.description: Color as a [r, g, b] array with values in [0, 1]

gradient.title: Gradient
gradient.description: A flat list of color stops followed by optional transparency stops. A color stop is [offset, red, green, blue]. A transparency stop is [offset, transparency]. All values are between 0 and 1

hexcolor.title: Hex Color
hexcolor.description: Color value in hexadecimal format, with two digits per component ('#RRGGBB')

i.title: In Tangents
i.description:
Array of points, each point is an array of coordinates.
These points are along the `in` tangents relative to the corresponding `v`.

o.title: Out Tangents
o.description:
Array of points, each point is an array of coordinates.
These points are along the `out` tangents relative to the corresponding `v`.

v.title: Vertices
v.description:
Array of points, each point is an array of coordinates.
These points are along the bezier path
